fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: All initiatives, policies and laws in the areas of fundamental rights, justice, migration, integration, health, education, labour rights and anti-discrimination, with specific focus on women's rights and migrants/refugees/ethnic minorities
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
We strive to combat discrimination and promote the rights and interests of migrant and refugee women within the Europe through coordinated advocacy, exchange of information, capacity building activities, projects and events and representing ENoMW members at both the European and the National level. Our objectives are:  
 
-To promote equal treatment, equal rights and better integration for migrant women in Europe. 
-To provide regular input on all areas of EU policy development and implementation that have an impact on migrant women’s lives. 
-To help shape social policies and design action programmes addressing migrant women’s specific needs. 
-To represent member’s organisations and lobby for and with migrant women to have a stronger voice at the international, European and state level. 
-To support and empower migrant women organisations and movements through training, resources and collobarative actions
